title: january 30: the beginning of (computer) viruses
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the beginning of computer viruses and some interesting cases over the years. Then she revisits a great debut release. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
